en.objectDoNothingError: You attempt to use the power of the object you're carrying... But it has no effect !
en.objectIsActiveDuringFights: The power of the object you are carrying is automatically activated during battle!
en.noActiveObjectdescription: You unfortunately have no active items in your inventory!
en.dailySuccess: {pseudo}, you have received your daily reward!
en.coolDown:
You can only use your daily item every {coolDownTime} hours. Come back in : 
 `{time}`.
